trans-unit.source: Represents a substitute input string that is used when the original input character cannot be encoded.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en erstatning Inndatastrengen som skal brukes når det opprinnelige inndataene tegnet ikke kan være kodet.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: It might not be possible to convert a character to an equivalent encoded byte sequence if no suitable encoding exists.
trans-unit.target: Det kan ikke være mulig å konvertere et tegn til en tilsvarende kodet byte sekvens Hvis det er ingen passende koding.

trans-unit.source: A common reason for an encoding to fail is if the conversion operation uses a code page that cannot represent the character to encode.
trans-unit.target: Det er en vanlig årsak til koding mislykkes hvis konverteringen bruker en annen kodeside som ikke kan representere tegnet til kode.

trans-unit.source: If the input character cannot be converted to an output byte sequence, a <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback?displayProperty=fullName> object provides a replacement string that is substituted for the original input character.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det angitte tegnet ikke kan konverteres til en output byte sekvens, en <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback?displayProperty=fullName>-objektet har en erstatningsstreng som er erstattet med det opprinnelige inndataene tegnet.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The replacement string initializes the value of the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> object, and the value of the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> object initializes the value of an EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer object.
trans-unit.target: Erstatningsstreng initialiserer verdien for den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>objektet, og verdien for den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>objektet initialiserer verdien for et objekt som EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> </xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>

trans-unit.source: The value of an EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer object is called the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for et objekt EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer kalles erstatning fallback-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The conversion operation encodes the replacement fallback buffer instead of the original input character, then continues to process the remainder of the input.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen koder erstatning fallback-bufferen i stedet for det opprinnelige inndata tegnet, og deretter fortsetter å behandle resten av inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer"></xref> class using the value of a <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av verdien for en <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>objektet.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>objektet.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the replacement fallback buffer to use the current replacement string.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder erstatning fallback-buffer til å bruke gjeldende erstatningsstreng.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> methods call Fallback if they encounter an unknown character in their input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>og <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A>metoder kall basis Hvis det oppstår et ukjent tegn i en handling.</xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the return value of Fallback is `true`, the calling method can invoke the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method to obtain each character in the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis returverdien for basis `true`, metoden kall kan aktivere de <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>metode for å hente hvert tegn i erstatning fallback-bufferen.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: An input character.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte tegnet.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored in this operation unless an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren ignoreres i denne operasjonen med mindre det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the character in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen posisjonen til tegnet i inndatabufferen.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored in this operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren ignoreres i denne operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the replacement string is not empty; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the replacement string is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis erstatningsdimensjonen-strengen er tom. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis erstatningsdimensjonen-strengen er tom.

trans-unit.source: This method is called again before the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*> method has read all the characters in the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles på nytt før den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>metoden har lese alle tegn i erstatning fallback-bufferen.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a replacement string can be used when an input surrogate pair cannot be encoded, or whether the surrogate pair can be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Angir om en erstatningsstreng kan brukes når en inndata erstatning paret ikke kan være kodet, eller om Erstatningsparet kan ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the surrogate pair and the index position of the pair in the input.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne angi Erstatningsparet og indeksen posisjonen for paret i inndataene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> methods call Fallback if they encounter an unknown character in their input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>og <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A>metoder kall basis Hvis det oppstår et ukjent tegn i en handling.</xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the return value of Fallback is `true`, the calling method can invoke the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method to obtain each character in the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis returverdien for basis `true`, metoden kall kan aktivere de <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>metode for å hente hvert tegn i erstatning fallback-bufferen.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The high surrogate of the input pair.
trans-unit.target: Høy erstatning inndata paret.

trans-unit.source: The low surrogate of the input pair.
trans-unit.target: Lav erstatning inndata paret.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the surrogate pair in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen posisjonen erstatning paret i inndatabufferen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the replacement string is not empty; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the replacement string is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis erstatningsdimensjonen-strengen er tom. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis erstatningsdimensjonen-strengen er tom.

trans-unit.source: This method is called again before the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*> method has read all the replacement string characters.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles på nytt før den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>metoden har lese alle erstatningen streng tegn.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>

trans-unit.source: The value of charUnknownHigh is less than U+D800 or greater than U+D8FF.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for charUnknownHigh er mindre enn U + D800 eller større enn U + D8FF.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of charUnknownLow is less than U+DC00 or greater than U+DFFF.
trans-unit.target: - eller - verdien for charUnknownLow er mindre enn U + DC00 eller større enn U + DFFF.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next character in the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter det neste tegnet i erstatning fallback-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> methods call <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> if they encounter an unknown surrogate pair or character in their input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>og <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A>metoder kall <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>Hvis det oppstår en ukjent erstatningspar eller tegn i en handling.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the return value of <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> is `true`, the calling method can invoke GetNextChar to obtain each character in the replacement fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis returverdien for <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>er `true`, metoden kall kan aktivere GetNextChar for å få hvert tegn i erstatning fallback-bufferen.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: The next Unicode character in the replacement fallback buffer that the application can encode.
trans-unit.target: Neste Unicode-tegnet i erstatning fallback bufferen som programmet kan kode.

trans-unit.source: Causes the next call to the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*> method to access the character position in the replacement fallback buffer prior to the current character position.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at neste kall til den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>metode for å få tilgang til tegnposisjonen i erstatning fallback bufferen før gjeldende tegnposisjonen.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the MovePrevious operation was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis MovePrevious operasjonen var vellykket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the replacement fallback buffer that remain to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet tegn i erstatning fallback bufferen som gjenstår å bli behandlet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method returns `true` if the Remaining property is nonzero.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>metoden returnerer `true` Hvis egenskapen gjenstående ikke er null.</xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the replacement fallback buffer that have not yet been processed.
trans-unit.target: Antallet tegn i erstatning fallback bufferen som ennå ikke er behandlet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes all internal state information and data in this instance of <xref href="System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer alle interne statusinformasjon og dataene i denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Reset method discards any persisted state information and data that govern emitting a replacement string.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tilbakestilling forkastes eventuelle faste tilstandsinformasjon og data som styrer sending av en erstatningsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Unpredictable results occur if the encoding operation continues after the Reset method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Uventede resultater oppstå hvis koding operasjonen vedvarer etter at metoden tilbakestilling aktiveres.
